narrative:
No non-compliant items identified during this inspection. 
 
This inspection and exit interview was conducted by the ACI, with the facility owner.
This applicant has met all requirements to obtain their class "B" license.
No regulated business can take place until your license has been issued. Conducting regulated activities without a
valid USDA license is a violation of the Animal Welfare Act.
All fees must be collected prior to your license being issued.  Mail fees to:  USDA-APHIS-Animal Care
